key_risks: Heavy reliance on regulatory support and carbon credit systems
Financial performance concerns and inconsistent revenue growth
Intense market competition in carbon capture and renewable energy sectors
controversies: Struggles to meet revenue estimates post-public listing
Dependence on government policies and incentives for growth
environmental_issues: Reduction of greenhouse gas emissions through innovative carbon recycling technology
social_issues: Promotion of sustainable industrial practices and circular economy principles
governance_issues: Heightened investor scrutiny following SPAC merger and public listing
